segments.text: Wow, look at all that water pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going for it, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but he seems to know what he's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, so patient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water or the children yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so lovely, so calm and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when the woman finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a scene, so much happening all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
